title: The future of news is people, bots, and the avatars we trust
description: Like many of us in the news business of this century, after a short-lived halcyon era of digital “innovation” where we gained new audiences that we didn’t own, I’ve been turning over in my mind what I see as the “future of news.” For the last quarter-century, our job in one way or another has...
